endpoints.description: Check the health of the API

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Whether to return a verbose response

parameters.name: times
parameters.description: The number of times to echo the message back

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: The delay in milliseconds before echoing back the message

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of users to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to start returning users from
